author: Timothy Tiernan
text:
http://www.dot.gov/grow-america/fact-sheets/rural
The U.S. Department of Transportation has touted the benefits that the bill could provide rural communities, including workforce development, a "fix it first" policy to address repairs and safety, and increased broadband infrastructure. How do you feel about the proposed legislation, and what issues are you facing as a rural community that are/are not addressed by the bill?
title: How Can the GROW AMERICA Act Help Rural and Tribal Communities?
